head.title: World Briefing | Europe: Estonia: Excavation Near Soviet Monument

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Europe: Estonia: Excavation Near Soviet Monument

abstract.p: Estonia begins excavating earth surrounding Bronze Soldier, Soviet-era war memorial in Tallinn, step toward relocating it to military cemetery; proposals to remove monument have brought strong reactions from ethnic Russians in Estonia and from Russian government (S)

block.p: Estonia began excavating the earth surrounding a Soviet-era war memorial in the capital, Tallinn, a step toward relocating it to a military cemetery. The monument, the Bronze Soldier, commemorates the victory over Nazi Germany but is viewed by many Estonians as a symbol of the Soviet occupation that followed. Proposals to remove the monument have brought strong reactions from ethnic Russians in Estonia and from the Russian government.
